Check.name: size
Check.description: Renders the Check at a different sizes.

Check.name: active
Check.description: Renders the Check with aria-pressed attribute, and styles the Check as if it where being clicked.

Check.name: disabled
Check.description: Renders the Check with disabled attribute, and styles the Check partially transparent.

Check.name: name
Check.description: Sets the form name of the Check.

Check.name: state
Check.description: Sets the checked state of the Check.

Check.name: value
Check.description: Sets the value sent whenever the parent <form> is submitted.

snippets.title: Check Preview

data.render:
Check

Check is typically used to present a set of options to the end-user, which they can then choose from.

Imports

<script>
    import {Check} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

States

You can control the state of the Check via the active, disabled, and state properties.

Palette

You can change the color palette of the Check via the palette property.

Size

You can change the size of the Check via the size property.
